name: BOX TYCOON
description:
Business Management Incremental Game

Buy box by using the machine.

But don't forget to refill the machine, so save money on fuel.

Your only goal is to make as much money as you can.

You can move the player by using 

                 "W" 

     "A"                      "D"

 And you can interact with world with 

      "       SPACE         "

like 

buying fuel

selling box

picking and dropping box

and pressing button
